title: Russian APT28 Runs Credential-Stealing Campaign Targeting Energy and Policy Organizations
description: Russian state-sponsored threat actors have been linked to a fresh set of credential harvesting attacks targeting individuals associated with a Turkish energy and nuclear research agency, as well as staff affiliated with a European think tank and organizations in North Macedonia and Uzbekistan.
